summary: This \'fixes\' the missing ring on the Dwarven war axe
descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION! This mod has been incorporated into the USKP.

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Yea! My second mod, so here goes:

At first, I thought that the Dwemer had a really cool magnetic war axe that magically clung to my armor, but then I realized that Bethsoft just let it slip by QC.


I made this a couple of months ago so I don\'t remember exactly how I did it. All I remember is that the ring was there, just not associated with the axe, I had to use NifSkope for the 1st time ever, and that the whole process was a pain in the rump!

But hey, it\'s the little things that make a game great.

Permissions:
Anyone can use my mod for their own purposes as long as they give me credit for my work and most importantly, they provide me with a link \'cause I\'m always on the prowl for new mods!

Absolutely do not upload my mod to any other site, especially Steam and its affiliated garbage. 
Credits:

All content, edited or otherwise, is assumed to be the original property of Bethesda Softworks and the file(s) posted here under the screen name \"ViperMkII\" are not-for-profit.
author: ViperMkII
